title: How to Explain About Crypto to Your Family and Friends - Altcoin Buzz
content:
Cryptocurrencies have rapidly gained popularity and are changing the landscape of modern finance.

However, explaining this complex and evolving concept to family and friends who may not be familiar with it can be a challenging task. In this article, we’ll explore some tips on how to effectively explain about crypto to your loved ones and help them understand this exciting new world of digital assets.

Start with the Basics

Before diving into technical jargon and complex concepts, begin by explaining the foundational principles. Define what a cryptocurrency is. For example, you can say this: “Cryptocurrencies is a digital or virtual form of money that uses cryptography for secure transactions and operates on a decentralized network called blockchain”.

Struggled to explain crypto and decentralization to your family over thanksgiving dinner? Listen and learn from the legend @jarroddicker and maybe you’ll have better luck over the winter holidays. 🎙️ https://t.co/DVu53H6cFT

📹 https://t.co/QIWMi8x1uF pic.twitter.com/9o5pDgteBv — RabbitHole (@rabbithole_gg) November 29, 2021

You will need to emphasize that cryptocurrencies are not physical coins but exist solely in digital form. Here are some things to use to explain:

Use Analogies

Analogies can be powerful tools for simplifying complex ideas. You can compare cryptocurrencies to concepts your family and friends are already familiar with. For instance, you can liken blockchain to a digital ledger, where all transactions are recorded in a transparent and immutable manner, similar to a shared Google Doc that everyone can see and verify.

Highlight the Benefits

You can also mention advantages like fast and low-cost cross-border transactions, financial inclusion for the unbanked, and the potential for decentralized finance (DeFi) to provide financial services without intermediaries.

Address Concerns

Acknowledging common concerns and misconceptions about cryptocurrencies is essential. So, you can address issues related to volatility, security, and illicit activities, explaining that like any investment or financial tool, it carries risks but can be managed responsibly with proper research and caution.

🎅 How do you explain Cardano to the family this holiday season? You may be taking some time out from #crypto this holiday 🎄 But if table talk does flow towards #Cardano, here’s your conversation starter…😉https://t.co/fGqxHRr3Zr — Input Output (@InputOutputHK) December 23, 2021

Demonstrate Real-World Use Cases

To make cryptocurrencies more relatable, share real-world examples of how they are being used. Mention how some businesses accept cryptocurrencies as payment, how individuals can send money globally without exorbitant fees, or how blockchain technology is being implemented in supply chain management.

Explain the Role of Mining

The concept of mining can be baffling for newcomers. Offer a simplified explanation that mining involves computers solving complex mathematical puzzles to validate transactions and add them to the blockchain. This process ensures the security and integrity of the network.

Discuss Different Cryptocurrencies

Introduce the idea that there are thousands of altcoins, each serving different purposes. Mention well-known ones like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Ripple, and explain their unique characteristics, use cases, and strengths.

Emphasize the Importance of Security

Educate your family and friends about the significance of securing their cryptocurrency holdings. Explain the use of private keys and wallets, and stress the importance of never sharing sensitive information or passwords with anyone.

It’s up to us to bring over the next wave of #Bitcoin & crypto users 👫 Learn how to explain crypto to your friends, family, coworkers, zoomers & boomers in our latest blog. https://t.co/6aQ9WOZSMf — Kraken Exchange (@krakenfx) August 7, 2021

Suggest Starting Small

If your loved ones express interest in investing, advise them to start with a small amount they can afford to lose. Stress that investing in cryptocurrencies, like any other investment, carries risks, and it’s crucial to diversify their portfolio and exercise caution.

Recommend Reputable Resources

Provide reliable sources of information, such as educational websites, tutorials, and reputable news outlets that cover cryptocurrencies like Altcoin Buzz. Encourage them to stay informed and updated on developments in the crypto space.

Conclusion

Explaining cryptocurrencies to family and friends can be a rewarding experience. Remember to be patient and understanding as they navigate this new territory. Breaking down the complexities and offering practical examples can make the subject more approachable.

By providing insights into the benefits, risks, and responsible investing practices, you can empower your loved ones to make informed decisions and explore the world of cryptocurrencies with confidence. As they delve deeper into this fascinating realm, they will undoubtedly appreciate your guidance and willingness to share knowledge about this transformative technology.

title: Google Bard predicts what will be Bitcoin price after 2024 halving - Finbold - Finance in Bold
content:
Shortly after OpenAI launched its text-based artificial intelligence (AI) tool ChatGPT, the technology saw renewed interest, leading to the rise of other generative AI bots, particularly Google’s Bard, which has already demonstrated its value in the cryptocurrency market analysis, including that of Bitcoin (BTC).

Indeed, as the price of Bitcoin continues to move sideways after losing the $30,000 level, Finbold sought Bard’s input on the future of the flagship decentralized finance (DeFi) asset after its halving in 2024, from a standpoint as of July 25.

Factors playing a role

As it happens, Bard delivered a detailed reply, highlighting that “there are a number of factors that suggest that the price could reach new highs,” including the upcoming halving event itself, increased global adoption of Bitcoin, and favorable regulatory frameworks around the world.

Bitcoin analysis. Source: Google Bard

On the other hand, Bard singled out the factors that could hamper Bitcoin’s gains after the halving, particularly the possibility of a bear market following the halving, as well as the rise of competing crypto assets that could pose a threat to its dominance.

Bitcoin price prediction

In terms of specific numbers, Bard has listed Bitcoin price predictions from several different sources, including the stock-to-flow (S2F) model by crypto analyst PlanB, which has set the price of the maiden cryptocurrency at $100,000 by 2024.

Furthermore, the second prediction, by British multinational bank Standard Chartered, projects Bitcoin to reach $120,000 by 2024, whereas India’s oldest cryptocurrency exchange, ZebPay, is not as bullish, setting the price of the largest crypto by market capitalization at $40,000 by 2024.

Bitcoin price analysis

Meanwhile, Bitcoin was at press time changing hands at the price of $29,125, which represents a decline of 2.33% in the last 24 hours, a 2.97% loss across the previous seven days, adding up to the 5.20% drop on its monthly chart, as per the latest information.

Bitcoin 30-day price chart. Source: Finbold

Currently, Bitcoin is facing the strongest support at the price of $27,583, whereas its resistance rests on the $31,010 level. Whether it can truly reach one of the price thresholds predicted above will depend on the various listed factors playing together.

title: Bitcoin Reaches Record Low Volatility: Why A History-Making Move Is Ahead | Bitcoinist.com - Bitcoinist
content:
Bitcoin price has barely moved in weeks, resulting in what is now the lowest volatility ever according to Bollinger Band Width on the one-week timeframe.

Here is a closer look at what this could mean for the undisputed king of crypto.

Weekly Bitcoin Bollinger Bands Become Tightest Ever

Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are known best for their notorious volatility and wild price fluctuations. Coins have commonly rallied by several hundred to several thousand percent, only to retrace and wipe out 80 to 90% of the growth during a bear market.

Following the longest bear market on record, BTCUSD had been at a standstill after reaching 30K resistance and could slowly be flipping the level into support. While this occurs, volatility has disappeared from the characteristically chaotic crypto space.

Volatility has dropped so low, it has caused the Bollinger Bands on the weekly timeframe to tighten to the most narrow width in the history of the first ever cryptocurrency. Whether it is Bitcoin or another asset, lulls in price action end with an enormous boom or bust.

When will explosive volatility return? | BTCUSD on TradingView.com

Why A History-Making Move Is On The Horizon In Crypto

Bollinger Band Width reaching all-time lows doesn’t say much about the direction of price action when the breakout ultimately occurs. What it does tell us in advance, is that an enormous move is coming — possibly one of the most powerful in the asset’s entire history.

Past instances of low volatility and tight weekly Bollinger Band Width always end with a bang. Sometimes these result in a boom cycle and a rally, while other times there was a severe breakdown.

For example, tightening nearly this much in 2016 led to the bull market that made Bitcoin a household name. In 2018, a period of tranquility ended with another 50% drop to conclude the bear market.

Whatever the outcome this time around, it will almost certainly be a move for the history books.
